parsed.internal_thinking: I have just placed my settlement at Node 43, which is a powerhouse for Wheat (6, 9, 9). To maximize my strategy, I need to secure a good source of Ore and Brick. Node 41 (9 Wheat, 5 Ore, 10 Brick) is an excellent target for my second settlement. To get there, I need to build a road from Node 43 to Node 42. This path also keeps the option open to reach the 3:1 port at Node 50 later on. Node 42 itself is a strong spot (9, 5, 9), though I can't build there yet due to the distance rule. Moving toward 42 is the most efficient way to expand toward the resources I'm currently lacking. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Headed toward Node 41 to pick up Ore and Brick. If that gets blocked, the 3:1 port at Node 50 is the backup plan.
parsed.say_outloud: pointing my road toward the coast, looking to bridge these fields together.
